confirmaction.messagetext:
The 'Is Marketing?' field is checked.
This vendor bill will be routed to Marketing Department approvers instead of the selected department's approvers.
Do you want to continue?

initcondition.formula: isChecked("Is Marketing?") = 'T' AND "Department (Main)" NOT IN ("{#Department#}1")
isChecked("Is Marketing?") = 'F'
isChecked("Is Marketing?") = 'T'

"Total" >= "Workflow:Approval Threshold:Department Auto Approval Limit" AND "User" NOT IN ("Workflow:Department Config:Primary Approver") AND "User" NOT IN ("Workflow:Department Config:Secondary Approver") AND "User" NOT IN ("Workflow:Department Config:Tertiary Approver")
"User" IN ("Workflow:Department Config:Primary Approver") AND "Total" >= "Workflow:Approval Threshold:Tier 1 Approval Limit"
"Total" < "Workflow:Approval Threshold:Company Auto Approval Limit"
"User" IN ("Workflow:Department Config:Secondary Approver") AND "Total" >= "Workflow:Approval Threshold:Tier 2 Approval Limit"

( "User" IN ("Workflow:Department Config:Primary Approver") AND "Total" < "Workflow:Approval Threshold:Tier 1 Approval Limit" ) OR ( "User" IN ("Workflow:Department Config:Secondary Approver") AND "Total" < "Workflow:Approval Threshold:Tier 2 Approval Limit" ) OR ( "User" IN ("Workflow:Department Config:Tertiary Approver") )
isEmpty("State:Tier 1 Delegate") = 'F'
isEmpty("State:Tier 1 Delegate") = 'T'
isChecked("Is Delegate Active") = 'F' AND isEmpty("Assigned Delegate Approver") = 'T'
isChecked("Is Delegate Active") = 'T' AND isEmpty("Assigned Delegate Approver") = 'F'
( "User" IN ("Workflow:Department Config:Primary Approver") ) OR ( isChecked("Is Delegate Active") = 'T' AND "User" IN ("Assigned Delegate Approver") ) OR "User" IN ("Next Approver")
"User" IN ("Workflow:Department Config:Primary Approver") OR ( isChecked("Is Delegate Active") = 'T' AND "User" IN ("Assigned Delegate Approver") ) OR "User" IN ("Next Approver")
"Total" >= "Workflow:Approval Threshold:Tier 1 Approval Limit"
"Total" < "Workflow:Approval Threshold:Tier 1 Approval Limit"

(({old.department.id}!={department.id} or ({old.department.id} is null and {department.id} is not null) or ({old.department.id} is not null and {department.id} is null))) or (({old.custbody_tsc_is_marketing_bill.id}!={custbody_tsc_is_marketing_bill.id} or ({old.custbody_tsc_is_marketing_bill.id} is null and {custbody_tsc_is_marketing_bill.id} is not null) or ({old.custbody_tsc_is_marketing_bill.id} is not null and {custbody_tsc_is_marketing_bill.id} is null)) and ({department.id}!=7 or ({department.id} is null)))
"User" IN ("Next Approver") OR "User" IN ("Assigned Delegate Approver")
isEmpty("State:Tier 3 Delegate") = 'F'
isEmpty("State:Tier 3 Delegate") = 'T'
isChecked("Is Delegate Active") = 'F' AND isEmpty("Assigned Delegate Approver") = 'T'
isChecked("Is Delegate Active") = 'T' AND isEmpty("Assigned Delegate Approver") = 'F'
"User" IN ("Workflow:Department Config:Tertiary Approver") OR ( isChecked("Is Delegate Active") = 'T' AND "User" IN ("Assigned Delegate Approver") ) OR "User" IN ("Next Approver")
"User" IN ("Workflow:Department Config:Tertiary Approver") OR ( isChecked("Is Delegate Active") = 'T' AND "User" IN ("Assigned Delegate Approver") ) OR "User" IN ("Next Approver")

(({old.department.id}!={department.id} or ({old.department.id} is null and {department.id} is not null) or ({old.department.id} is not null and {department.id} is null))) or (({old.custbody_tsc_is_marketing_bill.id}!={custbody_tsc_is_marketing_bill.id} or ({old.custbody_tsc_is_marketing_bill.id} is null and {custbody_tsc_is_marketing_bill.id} is not null) or ({old.custbody_tsc_is_marketing_bill.id} is not null and {custbody_tsc_is_marketing_bill.id} is null)) and ({department.id}!=7 or ({department.id} is null)))
"User" NOT IN ("Workflow:Department Config:Primary Approver") OR "User" IN ("Assigned Delegate Approver")
isEmpty("State:Tier 2 Delegate") = 'F'
isEmpty("State:Tier 2 Delegate") = 'T'
isChecked("Is Delegate Active") = 'F' AND isEmpty("Assigned Delegate Approver") = 'T'
isChecked("Is Delegate Active") = 'T' AND isEmpty("Assigned Delegate Approver") = 'F'
"User" IN ("Workflow:Department Config:Secondary Approver") OR ( isChecked("Is Delegate Active") = 'T' AND "User" IN ("Assigned Delegate Approver") ) OR "User" IN ("Next Approver")
( "User" IN ("Workflow:Department Config:Secondary Approver") ) OR ( isChecked("Is Delegate Active") = 'T' AND "User" IN ("Assigned Delegate Approver") ) OR "User" IN ("Next Approver")
"Total" >= "Workflow:Approval Threshold:Tier 2 Approval Limit"
"Total" < "Workflow:Approval Threshold:Tier 2 Approval Limit"

(({old.department.id}!={department.id} or ({old.department.id} is null and {department.id} is not null) or ({old.department.id} is not null and {department.id} is null))) or (({old.custbody_tsc_is_marketing_bill.id}!={custbody_tsc_is_marketing_bill.id} or ({old.custbody_tsc_is_marketing_bill.id} is null and {custbody_tsc_is_marketing_bill.id} is not null) or ({old.custbody_tsc_is_marketing_bill.id} is not null and {custbody_tsc_is_marketing_bill.id} is null)) and ({department.id}!=7 or ({department.id} is null)))
"User" IN ("Assigned Delegate Approver") OR "User" IN ("Next Approver")
{nextapprover.id} is not null OR {nextapprover.id} is not -1
"Total" != "Old Record:Total"
isEmpty("Next Approver") = 'F'
isEmpty("Next Approver") = 'F'
